name: Missing Burroughs, the Dark Ruler of the Highest Heaven
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 monster, 1 Spell, and 1 Trap from your GY. If this card is Special Summoned from the hand: You can banish 1 monster and 2 Spells/Traps your opponent controls and/or from their GY. You can only use this effect of "Missing Burroughs, the Dark Ruler of the Highest Heaven" once per turn.
